Class PeriodicSampleCache

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.PeriodicSampleCache
public class PeriodicSampleCache extends Object
A cache for periodic sample data.
Author:
Douglas Lau

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add(PeriodicSample ps, String name)
      Add a periodic sample to the cache. If the sampling period is incompatable with existing samples, the cache is cleared first.
      Parameters:
      ps - Sample to add to the cache.

    • getValue

      public int getValue(long start, long end)
      Get aggregate of sampled values in a time interval

    • iterator

      public Iterator<PeriodicSample> iterator()
      Get a sample iterator.

    • purge

      public void purge(long before)
      Purge all samples before a specified time stamp.
      Parameters:
      before - Time stamp to purge before.
